long_description: Represents the percentage of CPU system load for all available cores (sum of Sys, User and Wait CPUÂ percentage items)

description: EC CPU percentage in kernel mode (Sys)
long_description: Represents the percentage of CPU time spent in kernel mode

description: EC CPU percentage in user mode (User)
long_description: Represents the percentage of CPU time spent in user mode

description: EC CPU percentage waiting for resources (Wait)
long_description: Represents the percentage of CPU time spent in waiting for resources

long_description: Represents the global CPU capacity usage of shared lpars, calculated over EC (not applicable for dedicated partitions)

description: VP CPU percentage in kernel mode (Sys)
long_description: Represents the percentage of CPU time spent in kernel mode

description: VP CPU percentage in user mode (User)
long_description: Represents the percentage of CPU time spent in user mode

description: VP CPU percentage waiting for resources (Wait)
long_description: Represents the percentage of CPU time spent in waiting for resources

long_description: Represents the global CPU capacity usage of shared lpars, calculated over EC (for all lpars)
Represents the global CPU usage of the Pool that the lpar belongs to
Represents the global CPU usage in percentage of the Pool that the lpar belongs to
POOL Identifier that the lpar belongs to (the DefaultPool will always have a 0 ID)
Number of Virtual Processor affected to the Pool the lpar belongs to
